name: Google Classroom Dark Theme
description: A simple, material dark theme for Classroom Let me know down below if you find anything that still sears your irises, and I'll try to fix it. Use Stylus, not Stylish for installing these themes, due to privacy/security concerns with Stylish To do: clean up my code cuz it's a complete mess now after the redesign (thanks google) figure out how to fix some thing being white after you've clicked them sign out/add account hover
additional_info:
1.4 - 11/7/2019 - fixed text being black on black and a few things with narrow windows
1.3.12 - 10/1/2019 - fixed a couple of things that made it basically unusable, still working on it
1.3.11 - 1/15/2019 - fixed a bunch of text and borders and the app menu and stuff
1.3.10 - 1/11/2019 - updated a few little text things and a couple icons
1.3.9 - 1/10/2019 - updated to make it usable with the redesign
1.3.0 - 12/20/2018 - fixed a couple things, and made poll results not white
1.2.4 - 11/15/2018 - fixed the classwork page
1.2.3 - 10/30/2018 - few minor fixes, like "don't see all your classes?" text
1.2.2 - 10/19/2018 - fixed 'share something with your class' being white, again I guess?
1.2.1 - 10/11/2018 - un-whoopsed the html background
1.2.0 - 10/11/2018 - Fixed teacher comments being white
1.1.0 - 10/7/2018 - Fixed todo text and docs/slides/sheets etc icons being inverted
1.0.0 - 9/18/2018 - Fixed the alternate account selectors and cleaned up my egregious css a tad
0.9.4 - 9/9/2018 - made notifications menu and calendar section dark, and fixed a couple icons and borders/dividers
0.9.3 - 9/7/2018 - dark'd 'about' popup, the google apps and account menus, and the 'share something with your class' box
0.9.2.1 - 9/7/2018 - Google apps menu WIP
0.9.2 - 9/6/2018 - Fixed the 'mark as done' and the small-window classwork popup, and started adding comments to my css so that I don't go completely insane trying to fix things in the future
0.9.1 - 9/4/2018 - Made 'join classroom' and 'new post' dialogues dark, and made the dark blue and purple of links lighter so they're readable
0.9.0 - 9/1/2018 - Initial release
